QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Storm Peaks!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Rin Duoctane in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
The goblins of K3 have built a city in Storm Peaks and have sent their ambassador to recruit adventurers.
Speak with Rin and see what the people of K3 need. They would make valuable allies in our fight against the Lich King.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rin Duoctane in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Rin Duoctane in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Yo! Do I have an explosive proposition for you, pal....
